question: You live in a room in college which you share with another student. However, there are many problems with this arrangement and you find it very difficult to work.Write a letter to the accommodation officer at the college. In the letter• describe the situation• explain your problems and why it is difficult to work• say what kind of accommodation you would prefer
text: I would like to bring to your notice regarding some of these students are doing smoking within the hostel premises which is causing us to not to have good sleep due to this bad smell all around the campus.

As you know that, if we do not have good environment and tidy place and then we may not get comfort sleep and peace of mind too and this may lead to deviation at my workplace and finally may end up with health-related issues. If possible, please do some random checks with in the rooms. I am sure that you may found some smoking sticks around the campus.
With all this I would request you to please maintain good hygiene at our living place and it would be extremely good if you allot a separate room so that I may not get any issues with others.
I am look forward to hearing an update on new guidelines and some strict conditions within our premises
